message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. It comes with a range of features that cater to various needs, making it an invaluable asset. Considering its superior craftsmanship and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $180. This exclusive offer won't last long, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you're interested, let's arrange a convenient time for you to experience the product firsthand and discuss any questions you might have.
